1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Specialized relmap.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Relkit
6  ( 
7    -- * Datatype for Relkit
8    Relkit (..), RelkitBody, RelkitCore (..),
9  
10    -- * Derived types
11    RelkitTable, RelkitKey,
12    BodyMap,
13
14    -- * Calculation type
15    RelkitFlow, RelkitHook', RelkitBinary, RelkitConfl,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture     as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax       as S
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data         as D
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap  as C
23
24
25
26-- ----------------------  Datatype
27
28-- | Specialized relmap.
29data Relkit c = Relkit
30    { relkitInput  :: Maybe D.Head     -- ^ Input heading
31    , relkitOutput :: Maybe D.Head     -- ^ Output heading
32    , relkitBody   :: RelkitBody c     -- ^ Calculation function
33    }
34
35-- | Body of relkit.
36type RelkitBody c = B.Sourced (RelkitCore c)
37
38-- | Calculation of relation-to-relation mapping.
39data RelkitCore c
40    = RelkitFull         Bool (                O.Map     [[c]] )
41      -- ^ /Safe flow:/ Arbitrary relation mapping, i.e.,
42      --   mapping from multiple tuples to multiple tuples.
43    | RelkitOneToMany    Bool (                O.ManyMap [c]   )
44      -- ^ /Safe flow:/ Mapping from single tuple to multiple tuples, include no tuples.
45    | RelkitOneToOne     Bool (                O.Map     [c]   )
46      -- ^ /Safe flow:/ Mapping from single tuple to single tuple.
47    | RelkitTest              (                O.Test    [c]   )
48      -- ^ /Safe flow:/ Filter tuples
49    | RelkitAbTest            (                B.AbTest    [c]     )
50      -- ^ /Abortable flow:/ Filter by calculation.
51    | RelkitAbSemi            (                B.AbTest    [[c]]   ) (RelkitBody c)
52      -- ^ /Abortable flow:/ Filter by data.
53    | RelkitAbFull       Bool ( [BodyMap c] -> B.AbMap     [[c]]   ) [RelkitBody c]
54      -- ^ /Abortable confluence:/ Multiple to multiple.
55    | RelkitOneToAbMany  Bool ( [BodyMap c] -> B.AbManyMap [c]     ) [RelkitBody c]
56      -- ^ /Abortable confluence:/ Single to multiple.
57    | RelkitOneToAbOne   Bool ( [BodyMap c] -> B.AbMap     [c]     ) [RelkitBody c]
58      -- ^ /Abortable confluence:/ Single to single.
59
60    | RelkitAppend       (RelkitBody c) (RelkitBody c)
61      -- ^ /Connection:/ Append two mapping.
62    | RelkitId
63      -- ^ /Connection:/ Identity mapping, i.e.,
64      --   output input relation without modification.
65    | RelkitConst        [[c]]
66      -- ^ /Source:/ Ignore input, and output constant relation.
67    | RelkitSource       D.JudgeClass [S.TermName]
68      -- ^ /Source:/ Ignore input, and output relation from data source.
69
70    | RelkitLink         C.RopName RelkitKey (Maybe (RelkitBody c))
71      -- ^ /Reference:/ Link point to other relmap.
72    | RelkitNest         S.Token [S.IndexTerm] (RelkitBody c)
73      -- ^ /Reference:/ Give indecies to nested relations.
74    | RelkitCopy         S.Token C.RopName (RelkitBody c)
75      -- ^ /Reference:/ Give a name to input relation.
76    | RelkitLocal        S.Token S.LocalRef
77      -- ^ /Reference:/ Local relation reference, i.e., @^/r@ or @^r@.
78
79instance Show (RelkitCore c) where
80    show (RelkitFull        _ _)   = "RelkitFull"
81    show (RelkitOneToMany   _ _)   = "RelkitOneToMany"
82    show (RelkitOneToOne    _ _)   = "RelkitOneToOne"
83    show (RelkitTest          _)   = "RelkitTest"
84
85    show (RelkitAbFull    _ _ _)   = "RelkitAbFull"
86    show (RelkitOneToAbMany _ _ _) = "RelkitOneToAbMany"
87    show (RelkitOneToAbOne _ _ _)  = "RelkitOneToAbOne"
88    show (RelkitAbSemi      _ _)   = "RelkitAbSemi"
89    show (RelkitAbTest        _)   = "RelkitAbTest"
90
91    show (RelkitConst         _)   = "RelkitConst"
92    show (RelkitAppend      x y)   = "RelkitAppend " ++ show [x,y]
93    show (RelkitId             )   = "RelkitId"
94
95    show (RelkitSource     p ns)   = "RelkitSource " ++ p ++ " " ++ show ns
96    show (RelkitLink      n _ _)   = "RelkitLink " ++ n
97    show (RelkitCopy      _ _ _)   = "RelkitCopy "
98    show (RelkitLocal       _ n)   = "RelkitLocal " ++ B.name n
99    show (RelkitNest      _ _ _)   = "RelkitNest "
100
101-- | Relkit search table.
102type RelkitTable c = [(RelkitKey, Relkit c)]
103
104-- | Search key of relkit.
105type RelkitKey = (Maybe D.Head, [C.Lexmap])
106
107-- | Mapping for body of relation.
108type BodyMap c = B.AbMap [[c]]
109
110-- | Make 'C.Relkit' from heading of input relation.
111type RelkitFlow c     = Maybe D.Head -> B.Ab (Relkit c)
112
113-- | Make 'C.Relkit' from hook data and input heading.
114type RelkitHook' h c  = h c -> RelkitFlow c
115
116-- | Make 'C.Relkit' from one subrelmap and input heading.
117type RelkitBinary c   = Relkit c -> RelkitFlow c
118
119-- | Make 'C.Relkit' from multiple subrelmaps and input heading.
120type RelkitConfl c    = [Relkit c] -> RelkitFlow c
